components.name: ButtonComponent
components.templateData:
<button
  class="button {{
    type == 'primary'
      ? 'button--primary'
      : type == 'secondary'
      ? 'button--secondary'
      : type == 'warning'
      ? 'button--warning'
      : ''
  }} {{
    size == 'small' ? 'button--small' : size == 'large' ? 'button--large' : ''
  }}"
>
  <ng-content></ng-content>
</button>
